column4: does anyone know why loading xmodmap files from a startup program might not work?  i have a script set to run as a startup program, which contains the line "xmodmap ~/.remotekbmap", and i'm expecting it to load the modmap file "~/.remotekbmap", but it doesn't seem to be working
try running the script in terminal to look for errors
next thing to check is the path to the file in autostarted apps
